phrases: What is that you have got there?
She will catch a cold like this, right?
Go take her to the showers.
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
Fly high, high into the sky,
Fly high, high into the sky,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
He was not very healthy, so he stayed in the hospital.
But you have not caught me yet!
That night, the little match girl went to Heaven with the last shooting star.
I will not tell you sad stories anymore.
I will write a story for you.
One day, an egg became a chick.
The chick became a hen and laid an egg.
After taking three steps, the hen forgot that it was once an egg.
When you wake up, I might not be here anymore.
But there is not anything to be sad about.
It will all be a dream.
But there is not anything to be sad about.
It will all be a dream.
It is all a dream, so...
She believed what her brother said and thought everything was a dream.
She is been using that to escape from her sadness all these years.
Just as Takuya-san wished, so she would not be sad.
Thanks to his wish, Komari-san could smile the way she did.
When I was little, I found a pretty flower.
I picked it so I could take it to Onii-chan.
I did not know it would wilt.
There are lots of things in this world I do not want to know.
I wish they were all gone!
It is not much, but we brought a change of clothes for her.
It is probably better if we do not ask.
Could you take her back to her room?
I want to stay with Onii-chan.
Komari-san, you have to go back to the girls' dorm.
It is almost time for dinner.
You will not go anywhere while I am not with you, right?
Regardless, let us get you back to your room, Komari-kun.
How did it end up like this?
Komari-kun may be thinking that Riki-kun is her brother as a defense mechanism.
But that is just too sad!
Cannot we do anything for her?
We cannot do anything for her now.
If she never remembered what she did not want to know,
she would still be smiling like the sun right now.
I did not want to know either.
I did not want the truth.
But now that you know, there is no running away anymore.
If the world is full of things we never wanted to know,
is our only option to look the other way?
You are someone special to Komari right now.
That means the only one who can do something for herto save heris you.
You will not solve anything by running away.
I am the only one who can save Komari-san.
Do not look at me like that.
When we saw those shooting stars, your eyes were shining.
Your eyes could find all sorts of wonderful things!
I dropped it in a puddle.
But it is your picture book!
If you want it, you can have it.
Onii-chan will make me another one, so I do not need it.
So what I feared has happened...
Komari-san's memories are in a complete mess right now.
She should return to normal in a few weeks.
She will forget everything, then return to her normal, happy self.
That is what happens every time.
Some kind of death triggered it, right?
That is how it always happens to her.
She cried and screamed when my wife died, too.
She wandered around looking for her brother in a daze,
with her memories in a total mess.
And as time went by, she gradually forgot it all.
Even the fact that she had a brother.
I heard she went through the same thing when her pet goldfish died.
So Komari-san's been through this a few times already?
When she witnesses death, she remembers her brother's death,
and as time passes, she forgets it all again.
She is repeated that cycle over and over.
That is why I stay away from her.
I do not have much time left.
I can only imagine what she will go through if she sees me die.
I am sure she will be able to meet you normally someday!
I am sure there is something I can do too.
What on Earth do you think you can do, kid?
If there is anyone who can save her, it is me!
Please tell me where Kamikita Takuya-san rests.
I will go there to think about it!
Takuya-san's wish was for Komari-san not to be sad.
If he saw Komari-san in her current state, what would he do?
He seems to have started drawing something for Komari-kun.
Rin, want some pork cutlet with rice?
This is not the time for dumb nonsense like that!
I am just an idiot, so I do not know what to do!
In that case, let us bring Riki some pork rice balls!
There has to be something I can do too!
In Takuya-san's book, the hen forgets it was once an egg.
She keeps forgetting after she remembers Takuya-san.
But at the very end, the hen does remember.
It remembers it was once an egg.
You will not solve anything by running away.
If you turn your eyes away from sad things, they will happen again one day.
If you keep running away, you will just repeat the same mistakes.
That is why you have to face the truth straight on.
I suck at this, but it is all I can do!
The drawing paper and seaweed bowls are from Kurugaya!
Beef yourself up with these pork rice balls
I cannot do anything, but give it your all
Do not be too hard on yourself.
Also, your pictures are pretty good
Also, your pictures are pretty good
Beef yourself up with these pork rice balls.
I cannot do anything, but give it your all!
Do not be too hard on yourself.
Also, your pictures are pretty good!
They have always been there for me.
It is sad, but that is reality.
That is just a bad dream!
Sad things happen all the time!
The hen remembered that she was once an egg.
The hen opened her eyes to reality.
I added some more to the story.
and she realized that she had lots of friends around her.
They were always with her, through happy times and sad times.
There was a time when I cried like you.
Those were the hardest days of my life.
I had lost both of my parents.
That was when those four appeared before me.
Masato and Kengo and Rin laughed with me.
It is the same for you too.
You can start running forward, alongside me and Rin!
Even in the saddest and hardest times,
the Little Busters will always be together!
Then you can start writing your own story!
You will fill those blank pages with your own story!
The sound of the bell echoing,
The sound of the bell echoing,
Those pieces we shared, one each
Those pieces we shared, one each
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
Can we go beyond the stars?
Can we go beyond the stars?
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
But there are so many wonderful things!
You will be able to smile after you cry,
You will be able to smile after you cry,
And I will find a ton of them!
I said that because I know you can
I said that because I know you can
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
And I will not say good-bye
And I will not say good-bye
You will start walking again one day
You will start walking again one day
I will make a picture book.
I will eat sweet things, and I will go see Grandpa Kojirou.
I will find a ton of wonderful things.
I will find them with everyone!
Onii-chan, I think I am okay now.
Even if sad things happen and I cry, I know I will be able to smile again!
Even if sad things happen, and I cry,
I know I will be able to smile again!
Let us Find Wonder ful Things
Let us start with a bang!
You are joining the Little Busters, Saigusa-san?
